source.name: Collaborative programming environment
source.instructions: **Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a way of controlling the ChatGPT API in a collaborative programming environment?**

answers.answer: Having it create new programming languages
Using it to address questions and clarify misunderstandings

source.guidance: The following are mentioned the ability to control the ChatGPT API by adapting it to team dynamics, controlling its responsiveness, and using it to address questions and clarify misunderstandings. However, having the API create new programming languages is not mentioned as a method of control.
